message: Let's make a deal quickly, Bob. Time is money, literally!
Come on, Alice! Let's be fair. I won't get too greedy.
Bob, my friend, let's be sensible.  This is a decent offer, and the clock is ticking!
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm being generous here.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Let's split it evenly and call it a day. Any further delay will only hurt us both.
